Name: CSM SEPARATION
checklistText:
<size=21>PRE CSM SEPARATION checklist</size>
AUTO RCS SELECT (16) - MNA/MNB
SM RCS PRPLNT tb (8) - gray(verify)
SM RCS He tb (8) - gray (verify)
FDAI SCALE - 5/1
MAN ATT (3) - RATE CMD
LIMIT CYCLE - OFF (verify)
ATT DB - MIN
RATE - LOW
TRANS CONT PWR - on (up) (verify)
ROT CONT PWR NORMAL (2) - AC/DC (verify)
ROT CONT PWR DIRECT (2) - MNA/MNB (verify)
CM MODE - FREE (verify)
SC CONT - CMC
FC REAC vlv - LATCH
cb SECS LOGIC (2) - closed (verify)
cb SECS ARM (2) - closed (verify)
SECS LOGIC (2) - on (up)(verify)
RCS CMD - ON
SECS PYRO ARM (2) - ARM
GDC ALIGN
Thurst +X and hold
CSM/LV SEP pb - push
LV TANK PRESS - full scale low
THC - release

When clear, post sep
FC REAC vlv - NORM
CMC Mode - AUTO
HI GAIN ANT TRACK - MAN
HI GAIN ANT PWR - POWER
Slev ANT to verify operation
HGA angles: P=___ Y=___
S BD ANT OMNI - HI GAIN
HI GAIN ANT TRACK - REACQ
HI GAIN ANT TRACK - AUTO
